sources.title: Animals United
sources.description: A group of animals waiting for the annual flood they rely on for food and water discover that the humans, who have been destroying their habitats have built a dam for a leisure resort.

metadata.Plot: A group of animals waiting for the annual flood they rely on for food and water discover that the humans, who have been destroying their habitats have built a dam for a leisure resort. The animals endeavor to save the delta and send a message to the humans not to interfere with nature.
metadata.Writer: Oliver Huzly, Erich KÃ¤stner, Reinhard Klooss
metadata.Actors: James Corden, Stephen Fry, Andy Serkis
